snippet: Tom Allen, a partner in a Hollywood marketing firm that aims to attract churchgoers to movies and theater, hopes to take advantage of a “faith moment” on Broadway.
abstract: Religiously oriented Broadway shows are having trouble drawing audiences; Tom Allen, partner in Hollywood marketing firm Allied Faith & Family, which aims to attract churchgoers to movies and theater, suggests offering discount code to specific religious groups, allowing producers to track whether religious people are reserving seats in wake of marketing campaigns aimed at them.
lead_paragraph: Tom Allen, a partner in a Hollywood marketing firm that aims to attract churchgoers to movies and theater, hopes to take advantage of a “faith moment” on Broadway.
